A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was the worst Star War film I have ever seen. Completely disrespectful to the Original Trilogy\, the fans and basic common sense. Why didn't Admiral Idiot just explain to Poe what her plan was? He just successfully disabled the guns on the first order ship. It's a contrived ham-fisted way of shoving a dubious aesop down the audience's throat. Don't even get me started on what Rian Johnson did to Luke Skywalker....! Utter trash. Don't see\, don't buy\, don't let your brain die.
